text: Jone Spartano (born December 8, 1927 in Castellammare di Stabia) is a retired Italian professional football player. ==Career== Spartano began his football career with Ercolanese before joining Napoli.https://www.ilnapolista.it/2012/08/da-sallustro-a-insigne- gli-83-campioncini-di-casa-napoli/ He played for 6 seasons (113 games, 9 goals) in the Serie A for S.S.C. Napoli, A.S. Roma, Udinese Calcio and Calcio Catania. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:Living people Category:Italian footballers Category:Serie A players Category:Serie B players Category:S.S.C. Napoli players Category:A.S. Roma players Category:Udinese Calcio players Category:Brescia Calcio players Category:Calcio Catania players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Jone Spartano
